titleStmt.title: Tapeinobasia: or, A sermon of walking humbly with God. Preached at Serjeants Inne in Chancery-lane, by Mr John Ridley, Chaplain there. April 29. 1649. Imprimatur. John Downame. May 8. 1649.
titleStmt.author: Ridley, John R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Martin, and J. Ridley; and are to be sold at the Castle in Fleet-street, by Ram-alley,

notesStmt.note: The first word in title is in Greek characters.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
